description: This file defines the ApiService interface for accessing remote weather data via REST API endpoints, using Retrofit annotations. It specifies methods for getting current weather, forecast, location search, and reverse geocoding.

classes.name: ApiService
classes.description: Defines REST API endpoints for fetching weather and location data.

methods.name: getCurrentWeather
methods.description: Fetches the current weather information based on city name or coordinates.

methods.name: getForecast
methods.description: Retrieves weather forecast data for given location and number of days.

methods.name: searchLocations
methods.description: Performs a search for locations matching the query string.

methods.name: reverseGeocode
methods.description: Converts latitude and longitude into a location name.
